member.name: T:Du.WithDictionary
member.summary: Does various things with Dictionary objects.

member.name: M:Du.WithDictionary.JoinListOf(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}})
member.returns: A single dictionary containing all data from multiple dictionaries.

member.name: T:Du.WithDirectory
member.summary: Does various things with system directories.

member.name: M:Du.WithDirectory.VerifyDir(System.String)
member.summary: Verifies a directory exists, and creates it if it does not.
